proposal: Hey Flywheel community, congrats on reaching 40 holders in the ETH network! 🎉 Your project is like a well-oiled machine, turning volatility and arbitrage into a yield-earning powerhouse. Imagine adding a custom DEX or a blockchain-based lottery to your ecosystem. With our B2B tools, you can deploy these and more, making your PEAS even more powerful. Let's turn this flywheel into a turbojet, shall we? 🚀
